text: Anatoly Petrovich Sukhorukov (, 29 November 1935 â€“ 10 April 2014) was a Soviet and Russian physicist. He made many contributions to the development of the theory of waves and nonlinear interactions in optics, radiophysics, and acoustics. He was born in Moscow, Russia. Sukhorukov died in Moscow, Russia from an illness, aged 78. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Scientists from Moscow Category:Russian theoretical physicists
title: Anatoly Sukhorukov
